CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound bendalloy
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding bendalloy hollows the body. Stomach cramps, energy fades, and hunger gnaws at the bones â€” but every pang is captured in metal. With enough sacrifice, a single moment can become a feast that lasts for days.
